pages.title: 村长
pages.entity: minecraft:villager{Brain: {memories: {"minecraft:job_site": {value: {pos: [I; 9, 83, -13], dimension: "minecraft:overworld"}}}}, HurtByTimestamp: 0, Attributes: [{Base: 0.08d, Name: "forge:entity_gravity"}, {Base: 0.5d, Name: "minecraft:generic.movement_speed"}, {Base: 48.0d, Modifiers: [{Amount: -0.026432261783416282d, Operation: 1, UUID: [I; 723588660, -1792653325, -1417326747, 501394624], Name: "Random spawn bonus"}], Name: "minecraft:generic.follow_range"}, {Base: 0.0d, Name: "forge:step_height_addition"}], FoodLevel: 0b, Invulnerable: 0b, FallFlying: 0b, ForcedAge: 0, Gossips: [], PortalCooldown: 0, AbsorptionAmount: 0.0f, LastRestock: 0L, FallDistance: 0.0f, CanUpdate: 1b, DeathTime: 0s, Xp: 0, LastGossipDecay: 81833L, HandDropChances: [0.085f, 0.085f], PersistenceRequired: 0b, UUID: [I; -1922858791, 782978280, -1991680997, 1617707767], Age: 0, Motion: [0.0d, -0.0784000015258789d, 0.0d], Health: 20.0f, LeftHanded: 0b, Air: 300s, OnGround: 1b, Offers: {Recipes: [{maxUses: 16, buyB: {id: "minecraft:air", Count: 0b}, buy: {id: "chang_sheng_jue:gold_bullions", Count: 1b}, sell: {id: "chang_sheng_jue:silver_bullions", Count: 6b}, xp: 1, uses: 0, priceMultiplier: 0.05f, specialPrice: 0, demand: 0, rewardExp: 1b}, {maxUses: 16, buyB: {id: "minecraft:air", Count: 0b}, buy: {id: "chang_sheng_jue:silver_bullions", Count: 1b}, sell: {id: "chang_sheng_jue:yi_guan_tong_qian", Count: 6b}, xp: 1, uses: 0, priceMultiplier: 0.05f, specialPrice: 0, demand: 0, rewardExp: 1b}]}, Rotation: [171.05533f, 0.0f], HandItems: [{}, {}], RestocksToday: 0, ArmorDropChances: [0.085f, 0.085f, 0.085f, 0.085f], Pos: [9.57346816532285d, 83.0d, -11.112014649957507d], Fire: -1s, ArmorItems: [{}, {}, {}, {}], CanPickUpLoot: 1b, VillagerData: {profession: "chang_sheng_jue:chang_sheng_jue_chief", level: 1, type: "minecraft:swamp"}, HurtTime: 0s, "forge:spawn_type": "COMMAND", Inventory: []}
pages.text: 右键村长时有50%概率会触发村庄任务[除暴安良]，完成可获得一定奖励。

pages.title: 村长交易列表-新手
pages.text: $(br)$(li)1x 银元宝 → 6x 一贯铜钱$(br)$(li)1x 金元宝 → 6x 银元宝$(br)$(li)7x 一贯铜钱 → 1x 银元宝$(br2)

pages.title: 村长交易列表-学徒
pages.text: $(br)$(li)1x 钻石 → 4x 一贯铜钱$(br)$(li)4x 一贯铜钱 → 2x 油灯$(br)$(li)7x 银元宝 → 1x 金元宝$(br2)

pages.title: 村长交易列表-老手
pages.text: $(br)$(li)1x 指南针 → 4x 一贯铜钱$(br)$(li)4x 一贯铜钱 → 1x 绿宝石$(br2)

pages.title: 村长交易列表-专家与大师
pages.text: 专家:$(br)$(li)2x 书与笔 → 4x 一贯铜钱$(br2)大师:$(br)$(li)1x 银元宝 → 1x 字画$(br)$(li)2x 金元宝 → 1x 绿宝石$(br2)
